channel.title: Create new amplitude Datasource
channel.description:
Hi I am Manuel Acosta, and I want to contribute with an [amplitude](https://amplitude.com) datasource conector, you got any docs about adding new connectors? or a pr that I can follow to create this.
Thanks a lot.

item.title: Create new amplitude Datasource
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Hi there and welcome to the forum! Excited to see your connector. I’m getting ready to publish the instructions to our docs in this PR. It should merge in the next couple of days. And I’m happy to answer questions if you have them.

It’s easier than ever to add a new query runner. Can’t wait to merge this into the product

Read full topic
